# hashValue

**Instance Property**

The hashed value of the workout metric.

## Declaration

```swift
var hashValue: Int { get }
```

## Comparing metrics

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two workout metrics are equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two workout metrics aren’t equal.
- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of the workout metric by feeding them into the given hash function.
